text: Facesitting is when someone sits on someone else's face. People reportedly enjoy this due to a perceived sense of submission by the person getting facesat, where the person sitting is controlling the breath of the "seat". Facesitting is sometimes called "queening" or "kinging". ==Gallery== File:Lossow4.jpg File:Facesitting9.jpg ==References== Category:Sexual acts
title: Facesitting
